about_the_game:
In memory of those, whose lives were taken by the Russian invaders, erasing peaceful Ukrainian cities from the face of the earth and committing other acts of genocide and crimes against humanity.

Today in Ukraine, we are all in a close relationship with death. So we decided to look behind her and share this journey with you.

An innocent soul is trapped in the depths of the ruins of a home shattered by a rocket.

She turns into a small seed from which a flower grows and reaches out with its roots to other bodies trapped among the rubble to help restless souls find their way to heaven...

Soar through the transcendental realm and guide lost souls to heaven's gates in this rhythm-fueled psychodelic racing game.

Game features

  • Otherwordly visuals
  • Dark psytrance soundtracks from well-known producers
  • Dynamic transcendental flight gameplay
  • Infinite procedurally generated environments
  • The narrative twists and turns around the odyssey of the ethereal essence, beyond the veil of mortality

name: In Ukrainian Soil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB+, DirectX11 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse or gamepad
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB+, DirectX11 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse or gamepad
